title: Italy makes health pass mandatory for many leisure activities, in bid to pressure the unvaccinated
content:
1. Italy makes health pass mandatory for many leisure activities, in bid to pressure the unvaccinated  The Washington Post
  2. Italy to require COVID-19 'pass' for many activities  Associated Press
  3. Italy imposes ‘green pass’ restrictions on unvaccinated people  The Guardian
  4. Coronavirus: Italy brings in Covid certificate amid spike in infections  BBC News
  5. Italy to Require Proof of Vaccination or Negative Test for Social Activities  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: イタリアでは、予防接種を受けていない人に圧力をかけるために、多くのレジャー活動に健康診断書の提示を義務付けています。
意大利规定许多休闲活动必须有健康证，以向未接种疫苗的人施压
意大利規定許多休閒活動必須有健康證，以向未接種疫苗的人施壓
